input_email_body:
Subject: Issue with Access to Project Control Panel

Dear Customer Service, I have noticed disruptive delays while accessing the Project Control Panel. These delays seem to be due to recent increases in server load You can reach me at janesmith@company.com.. Clearing the cache and restarting the applications did not resolve the issue My name is Sophia Rossi.. The delays are intermittent but are impacting my productivity. Could you please provide a quick solution to this problem? I would greatly appreciate your assistance in resolving the issue. Thank you for your help.
